import styles from "./styles.module.css" import { AiOutlineLogin, AiOutlineMenu } from "react-icons/ai" import { FiUserPlus, FiShoppingCart, FiCodesandbox } from 'react-icons/fi' import { FaRegUserCircle } from 'react-icons/fa' import { BiCoinStack } from 'react-icons/bi' import { useState } from "react" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export function Sidebar() { const [sidebarState, setsidebarState] = useState(false) const [loggedUser] = useState(false) function changeValueFromsidebar() { const state = !sidebarState setsidebarState(state) } return (
Produtos
{loggedUser ? : } {loggedUser ? 'Compras' : 'Cadastrar-se'}
Carrinho
{loggedUser ?
: } {loggedUser ? 'Meu perfil' : 'Entrar'}
) }
